quest.name: Voice of the Soul
journal: Ryne is racked with agony as unseen tendrils grasp at her memories.

The entity formed by the fusion of Mitron and Gaia reaches into Ryne's mind, drawing on her greatest hopes and fears. The Ascian intends to shape these memories into an adversary created solely to destroy you and Ryne. Though it is impossible to predict the form your foe will take, you grit your teeth and prepare for battle.

※Eden's Promise: Anamorphosis can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
The grueling encounter reaches its conclusion as you triumph over the terrifying amalgamation of Ryne's most profound memories. What effect, if any, your victory may have had remains to be seen.

The fused Ascian is nigh on delirious upon discovering that such imperfect beings could succeed where the ancients once failed, by overcoming the manifestation of your own fears. As your foe moves to strike you down, Gaia's consciousness intervenes, forestalling the attack. This, however, only serves to enrage the Ascian, who begins to erase Gaia's memories one by one. Your adversary then proceeds to draw vast amounts of aether into Eden in order to create a utopia in which time has no meaning. The Ascian then disappears, though neither you nor Ryne intend to abandon Gaia to her fate. Ryne exerts her control over Eden, disrupting the aetherial flow, granting you an opportunity to give chase.

※Eden's Promise: Eternity can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
You withstand a relentless assault and finally succeed in freeing Gaia from Mitron. Though she appears physically unscathed by her ordeals, she remains unconscious, leaving Ryne visibly concerned.
Ryne's desperate attempts to wake Gaia are to no avail. For want of any better ideas, you decide to call her name in the hope that she will return to her senses.

Calling out to Gaia fails to have any discernible effect, but all is not lost. The ice crystal necklace that was previously concealed in Gaia's sleeve begins to glow, and Ryne is certain that it can somehow be used to reach out to your comatose friend.

At long last, Gaia awakens, greeted by the sight of the Empty flourishing with the bounties of nature. While Ryne is ecstatic to have fulfilled her dream of rejuvenating the once-barren wasteland, you sense that it is the safe return of her dear friend that means the most to her.
objectives: With the chat mode in Say, enter “Gaia” to call out to her.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: No... My memories... They're being used to fuel a summoning!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Unnnh... Is this how it feels to have the faerie inside my mind? To think Gaia had to endure it for so long...

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: You're right. However bad this is, it's nothing compared to what she's going through now.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: But if the summoning really is based on my hopes and fears, it will most likely create a foe unlike any you've ever fought before.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Whatever it may be, I believe in you! We'll find a way through this, I know it!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: While it seems that the summoning will be based on my memories, I still have no idea what form it will take.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Remember, it's all an Ascian ploy, so don't let yourself be fooled! Please, just do what you have to do. I'm sure you're more than a match for whatever Mitron has in store!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: So this is the way of the Ascians? To use the memories of our loved ones against us?

dialogue.name: GAIAPRIME
dialogue.text: That fragmented souls should triumph over their fears while we succumbed to ours, thereby setting our star upon a course of ruin...

dialogue.name: GAIAPRIME
dialogue.text: That inferior beings such as you should succeed while we failed! It defies all logic!

dialogue.name: GAIA
dialogue.text: Now's your chance!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Gaia's still in there, fighting to free herself from Loghrif's will!

dialogue.name: GAIAPRIME
dialogue.text: Even now, you would defy us!?

dialogue.name: GAIAPRIME
dialogue.text: We will remove every last vestige of your meaningless mortal existence!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Gaia's memories! They're being destroyed!

dialogue.name: GAIAPRIME
dialogue.text: Impurities must be purged. We shall begin by erasing you from her past, and then by your deaths, erase you from her future. There is no place for you in our utopia.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: We may be mere mortals, our souls fragmented, but our existence is not meaningless!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: And you should understand this! Before you awoke as an Ascian, you lived as one of us!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: You had your own memories, and surely they mean something? The lives you led can't all have been for nothing!

dialogue.name: GAIAPRIME
dialogue.text: To we who have known perfection, they are less than nothing.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Compared to yours, our lives may seem insignificant.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Nevertheless, we live them to the fullest! And though it may take us a thousand years, we have the potential to build a world every bit as wonderful as yours!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: But you won't even allow us a chance? To live our own lives and forge our own future?

dialogue.name: GAIAPRIME
dialogue.text: Whatever you forge will inevitably crumble to dust. But we are immortal, our legacy eternal. If our world cannot be made complete as it once was, we will create a perfect moment that shall last forever.

dialogue.name: GAIAPRIME
dialogue.text: By our hand shall our paradise be made, where there is no beginning and no end.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Eden's absorbing enormous amounts of aether! At this rate, the whole world will be drained!

dialogue.name: GAIAPRIME
dialogue.text: Light and Darkness, the elements of nature, all in harmony. A sublime utopia, where time has no meaning.

dialogue.name: GAIAPRIME
dialogue.text: We shall become one with Eden. Free to live in peace for eternity.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: No! Gaia!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: There's only one thing for it. I'll try to disrupt the balance of aether and create an opening for you!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: We can't let it end like this. It's up to us to save Gaia!

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Mitron won't get away with this.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: It's all about love, friendship, and courage!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: A place where time has no meaning, where there is no beginning and no end... I'm not sure I like the sound of that. We all die someday, but that's what makes life so precious!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: And I know that Gaia wouldn't want that, to simply exist without any hope for the future, to stay the same forever.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: How she lives is up to her. It's not for Mitron or anyone else to decide. We'll free her from that fiend and give her the chance she deserves!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Though Gaia is now free from Mitron, she remains unconscious.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The aetheryte shard is not responding.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: We did it! She's free at last! Or at least that's how it seems. She won't wake up...

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Gaia, I don't know if you can hear me, or if you even remember who I am, but just give me a sign that you're all right. Please, say something, anything!

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: She can hear you, Ryne. Keep trying!

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: You've brought her back once before, you can do it again!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: You're right, Forename. I mustn't lose hope!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Wait, what's this?

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: It's the necklace! But she said she left it back in the Crystarium...

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text:
Maybe she likes it a lot more than she lets on. I suppose it does hold a lot of memories for the both of us.
...Wait─there might be a way we can use this to bring her back!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Try calling Gaia's name to help bring her back to her senses.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: I'm not sure how to reach her, but if she remembers the necklace, maybe she'll find her way back to us!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Though Gaia appears unharmed, her consciousness has yet to return.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: With the chat mode in Say, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter “Gaia” to call out to her.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Gaia! We're right here beside you! Come back to us!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The necklace begins to glimmer faintly...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can only hope that Gaia is able to hear your voice.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: She can hear us, I know she can! Now, all we can do is pray that she'll return...

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Gaia, I know you're in there somewhere.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: If you're lost, I'll find a way to reach you!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: I swear it!

dialogue.name: GAIA
dialogue.text: Where am I...?

dialogue.name: GAIA
dialogue.text: Mitron... I'm finally free of you, it seems.

dialogue.name: MITRON
dialogue.text: Ah, dearest Gaia... That fate should part us once more...

dialogue.name: GAIA
dialogue.text: Still, this is what you wanted. There's no need to be quite so upset.

dialogue.name: MITRON
dialogue.text: What do you mean?

dialogue.name: GAIA
dialogue.text: You've been released from Eden, free to be reborn. Perhaps one day, fate will bring us together again, in another life.

dialogue.name: GAIA
dialogue.text: After all, you've already found me once, in spite of everything.

dialogue.name: GAIA
dialogue.text: I might even be the one to find you.

dialogue.name: MITRON
dialogue.text: I fear you will come to forget me. To forget the times we shared.

dialogue.name: GAIA
dialogue.text: Perhaps. After all, memories are such fragile things...

dialogue.name: GAIA
dialogue.text: That's why I'm planning to keep a diary. Even after I'm gone, my memories will live on.

dialogue.name: MITRON
dialogue.text: For future generations to discover...

dialogue.name: GAIA
dialogue.text: Yes. They'll read the tale of the girl bound by duty, and of her loyal protector, arrived in her hour of need.

dialogue.name: MITRON
dialogue.text: Perhaps you might leave out the part where that “protector” was the one who needed saving. You have grown strong, Gaia.

dialogue.name: GAIA
dialogue.text: If I'd found you sooner, then maybe...!

dialogue.name: GAIA
dialogue.text: No, wait! Don't leave me!

dialogue.name: GAIA
dialogue.text: Until we meet again, Artemis.

dialogue.name: GAIA
dialogue.text: Hm? Whose name did I just...

dialogue.name: GAIA
dialogue.text: Well, never mind that for now. I need to get out of here...wherever here is.

dialogue.name: GAIA
dialogue.text: I feel as though there's somewhere I'm supposed to be, but I can't for the life of me remember where.

dialogue.name: GAIA
dialogue.text: What's this?

dialogue.name: GAIA
dialogue.text: Is this...ice? It certainly looks like it, but it doesn't seem to melt. And it shines so brightly...

dialogue.name: GAIA
dialogue.text: I've seen this before...

dialogue.name: GAIA
dialogue.text: That's it! There was a girl... But what was her name?

dialogue.name: GAIA
dialogue.text: Ryne?

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Gaia!

dialogue.name: GAIA
dialogue.text: Ryne!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: I can hear you!

dialogue.name: GAIA
dialogue.text: I can't find my way out of here!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Hold on! I'm coming for you!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: You remembered!

dialogue.name: GAIA
dialogue.text: ...I could never forget you. Try as I might.

dialogue.name: GAIA
dialogue.text: So the aether that Eden had absorbed was returned to the land. Now, just like Mitron, the Empty can finally be reborn.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Though it can hardly be called the Empty now. It's...a utopia.

dialogue.name: SAYTODO
dialogue.text: Gaia
